name: Mechtonic
description:
A 3D Action Platformer with robots! Blaze through mechanical heights at high speeds with up to three characters to choose from!

This was a submission for the https://itch.io/jam/oga-summer-game-jam-4-2020 though it was merely a few minutes too late.

Thanks so much to everyone who supported the creation of this game!

Big thanks to Artyom Kornev/Shmank for Sound Design A huge thanks to the voice cast 

Hannah Joestar, 

Buttermlk (I'VE READ IT AS BUTTERMILK BUT IT'S BUTTERMLK), 

PoundToundHound, 

SillverVocals, and more!

Another great thanks to the creators of the assets in opengameart.org!

Assets used are https://opengameart.org/content/energy-pipe https://opengameart.org/content/modular-racetrack-3d-models https://opengameart.org/content/energy-module https://opengameart.org/content/street-lightlamp https://opengameart.org/content/reactor-0 https://opengameart.org/content/sci-fi-crate-0 https://opengameart.org/content/sci-fi-sound-effects-library https://opengameart.org/content/alien-builings-extension-pack https://opengameart.org/content/robotic-transformations https://opengameart.org/content/2-tilling-circuit-textures-pack https://opengameart.org/content/tilling-textures-pack-03 https://opengameart.org/content/clouds-skybox-1
